previous.excerpt: Managing multiple social accounts can be stressful and time-consuming. Share the same content to all your accounts at once with just a click of a button. Crosspost App frees you from having to do all that manual work, saving over 50% of your time for other important tasks. https://crossxpost.app/
previous.title: Crosspost App - Share your content to several social platforms in one click

localize.description: 管理多个社交账户可能既有压力又耗时。只需单击一个按钮，即可将相同的内容一次性共享给您的所有帐户。Crosspost App将您从必须做的所有手工工作中解放出来，为其他重要任务节省了超过50%的时间。https://crossxpost.app/
localize.tagline: 一键将您的内容共享到多个社交平台

localize.description: 管理多個社交賬戶可能既有壓力又耗時。只需單擊一個按鈕，即可將相同的內容一次性共享給您的所有帳戶。Crosspost App將您從必須做的所有手工工作中解放出來，爲其他重要任務節省了超過50%的時間。https://crossxpost.app/
localize.tagline: 一鍵將您的內容共享到多個社交平臺

next.excerpt: Following the previously successful model SK61, EPOMAKER has made some improvements based on real customer feedback. Thus we designed this new AK61/AK61S with a custom Mac layout and functions for Mac users.
next.title: Epomaker AK61 - A programmable mechanical keyboard with 61 keys

localize.description: 在之前成功的SK61型号之后，EPOMAKER根据真实的客户反馈进行了一些改进。因此，我们为Mac用户设计了这款带有自定义Mac布局和功能的新AK61/AK61S。
localize.tagline: 一种61键的可编程机械键盘

localize.description: 在之前成功的SK61型號之後，EPOMAKER根據真實的客戶反饋進行了一些改進。因此，我們爲Mac用戶設計了這款帶有自定義Mac佈局和功能的新AK61/AK61S。
localize.tagline: 一種61鍵的可編程機械鍵盤
